name: WildChair
description:
A fast paced game where you play as a mysterious wheelchair-bound deliveryman who is tasked with delivering all kinds of food to the hungry workers of San Federico City.

Features

  • Play as a wheelchair bound man who loves going fast
  • Deliver food as fast as possible and get the highest scores
  • Deliver all kinds of food, some which need you to be careful as you drive
  • Take advantage of your condition to drive through crowds
  • Race against your rivals to prove who is superior (if you manage to find them...)

-------------------------

San Federico is a small, yet extremely busy city. It's almost completely full of office buildings, where workers work from sunrise to sunset. Office workers get a mere 30 minutes to eat lunch, and almost all of them work in the higher floors. Due to their lack of time, food delivery services are their only hope of eating lunch before their break ends.

This issue has caused numerous restaurants to open in San Federico. Since most office workers need too much time (over 5 minutes... phew!) to reach the restaurants,  food delivery becomes essential for them to endure their work and miserable existence. Unsurprisingly, food delivery services have become a highly competitive industry in the city. Only the most skilled, fastest deliverymen are able to survive working there.

One day, a mysterious helmeted man in a motorized wheelchair appeared in one of San Federico's most well known restaurants - famous San Federico's Take Away - asking for work as a deliveryman. Dismissing his proposal as a joke, the owner offers him work as a cashier instead. However, the only cashier the restaurant had manages to convince the owner to give the wheelchair man a chance. The owner begrudgingly hires the wheelchair-bound man, expecting him to last less than a day...

-------------------------

By SalchiPatos Team
